parameters.name: x-account-id
parameters.description: The account identifier

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Indicates that the raw request result is returned

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Query parameters that can be used to pass through parameters to the underlying provider request by surrounding them with 'proxy' key

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma separated list of fields that will be returned in the response (if empty, all fields are returned)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: ATS Application Filter

updated_after.description: Use a string with a date to only select results updated after that given date

created_after.description: Use a string with a date to only select results created after that given date

job_id.description: Filter to select applications by job_id

stage.description: Filter to select applications by stage and sub-stage

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the results to fetch

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: The unified cursor

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Use a string with a date to only select results updated after that given date

parameters.name: sync_token
parameters.description: The sync token to select the only updated results

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: The comma separated list of fields that will be expanded in the response

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: The comma separated list of fields that will be included in the response

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: Filter for job ID to retrieve a list of applications related to this job

200.description: The list of applications was retrieved.

Retry-After.description: A time in seconds after which the request can be retried.

412.description: Precondition failed: linked account belongs to a disabled integration.

500.description: Server error while executing the request.

info.title: ATS
info.description: The documentation for the StackOne Unified API - ATS

source_value.description: The source value of the answer type.

unified_custom_fields.description: Custom Unified Fields configured in your StackOne project

remote_candidate_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the candidate

remote_job_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the job

interview_stage_id.description: Unique identifier of the interview stage

remote_interview_stage_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the interview stage

rejected_reason_ids.description: Unique identifiers of the rejection reasons

remote_rejected_reason_ids.description: Provider's unique identifiers of the rejection reasons

remote_location_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the location

remote_location_ids.description: Remote's unique identifiers of the locations

documents.description: The documents attached to this application (eg. resume, cover letter etc.)

file_name.description: The file name of the attachment.

phone_numbers.description: List of candidate phone numbers including the type of the number when available

source_value.description: The source value of the application status.

description.example: Skills test to gauge a candidate's proficiency in job-specific skills

start_date.description: The start date of the candidate test

submission_date.description: The submission date of the candidate test

summary.description: The summary about the result of the test

source_value.description: The source value of the description type.

passthrough.description: Value to pass through to the provider

job_posting_id.description: Unique identifier of the job posting that is associated with application

candidate_id.description: Unique identifier of the candidate. Provide this OR candidate, but not both.

candidate.description: Candidate Properties. Provide this OR candidate_id, but not both. Providing this attempts to create a new candidate with the application.

passthrough.description: Value to pass through to the provider

description.example: Skills test to gauge a candidate's proficiency in job-specific skills

passthrough.description: Value to pass through to the provider
Value to pass through to the provider

unified_custom_fields.description: Custom Unified Fields configured in your StackOne project

phone_numbers.description: List of candidate phone numbers including the type of the number when available

passthrough.description: Value to pass through to the provider

unified_custom_fields.description: Custom Unified Fields configured in your StackOne project

passthrough.description: Value to pass through to the provider
Value to pass through to the provider
Value to pass through to the provider

path.description: The path where the file is stored

category.description: The category of the the document

contents.description: The content of the file. Deprecated, use `url` and `file_format` one level up instead

created_at.description: The creation date of the file

updated_at.description: The update date of the file

remote_url.description: URL where the file content is located

file_format.description: The file format of the file
